ie.dcu.cngl.tokenizer

Class Sentenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.dcu.cngl.tokenizer.Sentenizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISentenizer

    public class Sentenizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISentenizer
    Separates the tokenized content into sentences.
    Author:
    Johannes Levelling

      static Sentenizer getInstance()
